TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MembershipUser extends System.Object

summary.span: Exposes and updates membership user information in the membership data store.

span.span: Exposes and updates membership user information in the membership data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象用于表示成员资格数据存储区中的单个成员资格用户。The object is used to represent a single membership user in the membership data store. 它公开成员资格用户的电子邮件地址，例如有关的信息，并提供成员资格用户，例如能够更改或重置其密码的功能。It exposes information about the membership user such as the email address, and provides functionality for the membership user such as the ability to change or reset his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 成员资格功能，请参阅[成员资格简介](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980)然后再继续。If you are not familiar with the membership features of ASP.NET, see [Introduction to Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/79184d17-f4c7-4c9f-a073-cec4f5543980) before continuing. 与成员资格相关的其他主题的列表，请参阅[使用成员资格管理用户](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 一个返回对象并方法或作为的一部分返回， ，和方法。A object is returned by the and methods or as part of a returned by the , , and methods. 一个对象所需的方法时想要更新现有成员资格用户的信息。A object is required by the method when you want to update the information for an existing membership user. ## Examples 下面的代码示例更新用户的电子邮件地址。The following code example updates the email address for a user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/CS/UpdateEmailcs.aspx#11)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.SqlMembershipProvider/VB/UpdateEmailvb.aspx#11)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新对象不会向成员资格数据存储区中添加新的成员资格用户对象。Creating a new object does not add a new membership user object to the membership data store. 若要将新的成员资格用户添加到成员资格数据存储区中，使用方法。To add a new membership user to the membership data store, use the method. 请注意，方法将返回成员资格用户添加到数据存储的对象。Note that the method returns a object for the membership user added to the data store. 可以在应用程序代码中用于构造对象方法。 objects can be constructed in application code for use with the method. 或者，你还可以传递返回对象， ， ， ，或方法也方法。Alternatively, you can also pass a object returned from the , , , , or method to the method as well. 对象通常也通过成员资格提供程序实现构造， ， ， ，和方法。 objects are also commonly constructed by membership-provider implementations for the , , , , and methods. `name`， `email`，和`passwordQuestion`参数都要进行调整在使用前。The `name`, `email`, and `passwordQuestion` parameters are all trimmed before being used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的实现成员资格提供程序的方法。The following code example shows an implementation of the method for a membership provider. 该方法会构建成功将用户添加到数据存储时，将返回的对象。The method constructs a object that is returned when the user is successfully added to the data store. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性来更新成员资格数据存储区中的成员资格用户的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to update the password for the membership user in the membership data store. 成员资格提供程序可能有密码的大小限制。The membership provider may have restrictions on the size of the password. 有关大小限制，请参阅成员资格提供程序的文档。For size limitations, see the documentation for the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将修改当前登录的用户的密码。The following code example modifies the password for the current logged-on user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以用于存储成员资格用户的特定于应用程序的自定义信息。The property can be used to store custom information for a membership user that is specific to an application. 可以存储在中的信息量属性定义的引用的成员资格提供程序属性。The amount of information that can be stored in the property for a is defined by the membership provider referenced by the property. 如果你的应用程序需要更多空间来存储用户信息大于所允许的成员资格提供程序，可以实现自定义成员资格提供程序，或使用用户。If your application requires more space to store user information than is allowed by the membership provider, you can implement a custom membership provider, or use the user .

summary.span: Gets the password for the membership user from the membership data store.

span.span: Gets the password for the membership user from the membership data store.

returns.span: The password for the membership user.

span.span: The password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性从成员资格数据存储中检索的成员身份的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership from the membership data store. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供程序支持使用密码的，将无法检索成员资格用户的密码，应考虑进行使用的方法时用户忘记了其密码。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 一个如果将引发`enablePasswordRetrieval`设置为`true`并`passwordFormat`设置为`Hashed`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果是`true`，则必须使用重载采用一个密码作为参数回答并提供成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法来检索指定的用户名的密码。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name. 密码发送到用户的电子邮件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. 请注意，被假定为`false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!NOTE] > 需要高级别的安全性的站点，不建议使用电子邮件以明文返回的密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高安全网站，建议返回密码使用加密，例如 SSL。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/retrievepassword2cs.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/retrievepassword2vb.aspx#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性从成员资格数据存储中检索的成员资格用户的密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to retrieve the password for the membership user from the membership data store. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果提供程序支持使用密码的，将无法检索成员资格用户的密码，应考虑进行使用的方法时用户忘记了其密码。If the provider supports passwords with a of , you will be unable to retrieve the password for the membership user and should consider making use of the method when a user has forgotten his or her password. > [!NOTE] > 一个如果将引发`enablePasswordRetrieval`设置为`true`并`passwordFormat`设置为`Hashed`ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件中。A will be thrown if `enablePasswordRetrieval` is set to `true` and `passwordFormat` is set to `Hashed` in the Web.config file for the ASP.NET application. 如果是`false`，可以提供`null`有关`answer`参数或使用不采用任何参数的重载。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例调用方法来检索指定的用户名的密码，如果在正确的密码答案。The following code example calls the method to retrieve the password for a specified user name if the correct password answer is supplied. 密码发送到用户的电子邮件地址。The password is sent to the user's email address. > [!NOTE] > 需要高级别的安全性的站点，不建议使用电子邮件以明文返回的密码。Returning a password in clear text using email is not recommended for sites that require a high level of security. 对于高安全网站，建议返回密码使用加密，例如 SSL。For high-security sites, it is recommended that you return passwords using encryption, such as SSL. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/retrievepasswordcs.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/retrievepasswordvb.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将用户视为联机的当前日期和时间减去属性值是早于用户。A user is considered online if the current date and time minus the property value is earlier than the for the user. 用户更新为当前日期和时间，并方法，并可以通过一些重载更新方法。The for a user is updated to the current date and time by the , and methods, and can be updated by some of the overloads of the method. > [!NOTE] > 用户的属性值更新中的类和命名空间从检索到或在数据源中设置用户数据时。The property value for a user is updated by the classes in the and the namespaces whenever user data is retrieved from or set at the data source. 如果你的应用程序使用相同的数据源来存储用户信息和你和具有相同配置`applicationName`作为你，然后和的用户的属性将反映此行为。If your application uses the same data source to store user information, and your and are configured with the same `applicationName` as your , then the and properties of the user will reflect this behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示中的所有成员资格用户名控制和使用标签来显示所选的用户名称的特定成员资格信息包括成员资格用户的属性值。The following code example displays all membership user names in a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for the selected user name, including the property value for the membership user. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性重置到一个新的成员资格用户的密码自动生成密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 新密码则返回到调用方。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果是`true`，则必须使用重载采用一个密码作为参数回答并提供成员资格用户的密码提示问题答案。If is `true`, you must use the overload that takes a password answer as a parameter and supply the password answer for the membership user. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重置用户的密码，并返回新的、 自动生成密码。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. 请注意，被假定为`false`。Note that is assumed to be `false`. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). span.span: The new password for the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法的引用的成员资格提供程序属性重置到一个新的成员资格用户的密码自动生成密码。 calls the method of the membership provider referenced by the property to reset the password for the membership user to a new, automatically generated password. 新密码则返回到调用方。The new password is then returned to the caller. 如果是`false`，成员资格提供程序将返回一个异常。If is `false`, the membership provider will return an exception. 如果是`false`，可以提供`null`有关`answer`参数或使用不采用任何参数的重载。If is `false`, you can supply `null` for the `answer` parameter, or use the overload that does not take any parameters. 如果密码提示问题答案是必需的并提供了不正确的密码答案，引发的成员资格提供程序。If a password answer is required and an incorrect password answer is supplied, a is thrown by the membership provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例重置用户的密码，并返回新的、 自动生成密码。The following code example resets a user's password and returns the new, automatically generated password. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例包含一个文本框，用于接受用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example contains a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/CS/ResetPasswordcs.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUser#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUser/VB/ResetPasswordvb.aspx#5)]

summary.span: Clears the locked-out state of the user so that the membership user can be validated.

span.span: Clears the locked-out state of the user so that the membership user can be validated.

returns.span: if the membership user was successfully unlocked; otherwise, .

span.span: if the membership user was successfully unlocked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用户最常被锁定，无法通过验证方法时内访问。Users are most commonly locked out and cannot be validated by the method when the is reached within the . 用户也会被锁定如果您使用或重载接受密码提示问题答案和用户输入错误答案数达到的值内。Users can also be locked out if you use the or overload that accepts a password answer and the number of bad answers entered by the user reaches the value of within the . 此方法的实现应设置属性设置为`false`，将属性设置为当前日期和重置任何计数器，用于跟踪的失败登录尝试，依此类推。Your implementation of this method should set the property to `false`, set the property to the current date, and reset any counters that you use to track the number of failed log in attempts and so forth.

summary.span: Gets the logon name of the membership user.

span.span: Gets the logon name of the membership user.

value.span: 成员身份用户的登录名。

span.span: The logon name of the membership user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成员资格用户的与成员资格用户的密码结合使用成员资格用户进行身份验证。A membership user's is used in conjunction with the membership user's password to authenticate the membership user. 的标识每个应用程序使用的唯一用户进行身份验证。The of a identifies a unique user for each application that uses for authentication. 应用程序标识成员身份。An application is identified by the membership . 为不同的用户，可以在多个应用程序中使用相同的用户名。The same user name can be used in multiple applications for different users. 或者，单个用户名称可用于标识多个应用程序的用户提供将应用程序配置具有相同。Alternatively, a single user name can be used to identify a user for multiple applications, provided the applications are configured with the same . 可以检索通过将用户名称传递给其中一个重载的成员资格用户对象方法，或作为的成员从返回， ，或方法。You can retrieve a object for a membership user by passing the user name to one of the overloads of the method, or as a member of a returned from the , , or method. 如果已知用户的电子邮件地址，通过使用可以检索成员资格用户的用户名方法。You can retrieve the user name for a membership user if the email address for the user is known, by using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例绑定到应用程序中的所有成员资格用户的属性控制和使用标签来显示选定的用户名称的特定成员资格信息。The following code example binds the property of all the membership users in an application to a control and uses labels to show specific membership information for a selected user name. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/CS/itemcs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.MembershipUserCollection/VB/itemvb.aspx#2)]
